Proxies.Use Proxies: Whether you want to use proxies or not. HQ proxies are recommended. | true, false
Proxies.Proxy Type: Proxy type you would like to use. | http, socks4, socks5

Config.Threads: Max concurrent registrations running at once. Actual threads are determined by your proxies speed / quality.
Config.Amount To Generate: Amount of accounts you would like to generate.
